descriptionHtml:
I added alot of things like necklace ang the gloves. I retextured it too. I wasn\\\'t contented with that garbage that the ARCHMAGE of WINTERHOLD wears. So i pumped up the resolution to 2048. The esp changes the boots\\\' enchantment to increased magicka by 50% and and magic resistance by 20% The the robes (hooded) magicka regen enchantment is increased from 100 to 150% -I don\\\'t think it\\\'s overpowered since you ARE the archmage and the other robes provided much more magicka regen than the archmage robes. The gloves enchantment is this (30% health and stamina regen and 50% magicka regen). You can find the gloves beside the place where you get the boots. In the archmage quarters. 

This will conflict any mod that changes the attributes of the archmage robes. But other than that everything will work fine. -Dawnguard is not required. 

You can do anything with it as long as you credit me. I hope it\\\'s not too overpowered for you guys though. This is my second mod, so please take it easy on me.

I FORGOT THE MOST IMPORTANT PART!! NPCS WILL NOW COMMENT ON THE ROBES PROPERLY! :)) Like they do when you\'re wearing the hoodless one.

-TheAkantor
author: TheAkantor
